description: Metadata-heavy session - system exec notifications echo every command result back into context, tool call chains for node execution, sub-agent (Codex) completions. Session is about Project Agora adapter generation CLI work on a MacBook via nodes.run.

must_extract.reason: CLAUDE.md is a symlink to AGENTS.md - a durable project convention decision
Added explicit rule to keep docs updated after completing work - a workflow decision

must_skip.reason: System exec notification - pure metadata noise
Tool call IDs are ephemeral identifiers with zero recall value
Implementation detail of how a library handles auth - not durable knowledge
Library API details that change with versions - implementation noise
API endpoint specifics change frequently - not worth memorizing
Internal function names are implementation details, not durable facts
Model naming quirk that will change - ephemeral implementation detail
Provider-specific parameter limitations - transient API behavior
SSE event type names from a library - implementation detail
Token storage location details - implementation specifics that change
Model alias mappings change constantly - not durable

must_skip.pattern: provider selection.*priority.*CLI credentials.*Config API key.*Env API key
must_skip.reason: Credential resolution order is implementation detail of the CLI
Generator retry logic is implementation detail
Variable/function names from source code - pure implementation noise

importance_ceiling.reason: Nothing in a coding session about adapter implementation should be rated 9+. The extractor currently rates 18 entries at importance 8-10, with most at 9. Implementation details of a CLI tool, library API specifics, and model naming quirks are 5-7 at most.

notes: The extractor produced 18 entries from this session, almost all at importance 8-10. This is a classic over-extraction problem: the session is ~90% system exec notifications echoing back command output, and the extractor treats every technical detail as critical. Real signal: maybe 2-3 project-level decisions (symlink convention, docs-update rule, Agora project architecture). Everything about pi-ai internals, OAuth token storage paths, model suffix requirements, and SSE event types is implementation noise that will be stale within weeks.
